pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, March 31, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, March 31, 2017:

Etobicoke, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will highlight Budget 2017 investments in transit. A media availability will follow.

GO Transit Willowbrook Rail Maintenance Facility
125 Judson Street
Etobicoke, Ontario   

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 8:45 a.m. and present themselves to Gate 3, at south end of Etona court
  • Parking available on west side of Etona Court
  • Open coverage for remarks and media availability

Scarborough, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with caregivers and their family members.

Malvern Family Resource Centre
90 Littles Road
Scarborough, Ontario

Notes for media:

  •  Media must arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • Open coverage for photo opportunity

Note: all times local.
